message: I did it the other day.  If you install the mysql DMG, it puts everything in /usr/local/mysql.  In order to get python-mysql to build you have to add "DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/mysql/lib/" to your environment.
I install mysql via homebrew. I've not had any problems getting the python dbapi adapter to build on snow leopard.
homebrew is the way to go for sure :)
